scripts.setup: cd vue && npm install && cd ../sails && npm install && npm audit fix && cd .. && npm run vue-build
scripts.vue-build: cd vue && npm run build && rm -rf ../sails/assets/ && cp -a dist/. ../sails/assets && touch ../sails/assets/.gitkeep
scripts.test: npm run vue-lint && npm run sails-test
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run vue-lint && npm run vue-build && npm run sails-start-dev
